title: Bitterman, Marvin Gaye, Selma $300 Million and more.
itunes:title: Bitterman, Marvin Gaye, Selma $300 Million and more.
description:
Top of the week y'all and the show is in full effect with a recommendation from The CEO.  We find out the real reason J. Anthony Brown is so bitter.  Church Complaints is back and they talk about Madea.  We find out the identity of the woman who posted R. Kelly's bail.  Bernie Sanders and other 2020 Presidential candidates visit Selma.  Marvin Gaye gets his own USPS stamp.  When was the last time Steve cut grass?  Carla's Reality Update has a special edition for today.  Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO covers taking inventory, not being able to help everybody and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
